title: What's wrong ?
content:
Pixel 4a

I've had my phone for about 3 weeks 
A few days ago I charged my phone in the morning and it was fine but then later in the night went to charge it again and it wouldn't charge, the cord won't charge anything now  so I started using another cord and it was fine but now the screen has a couple purple dots and a little bit of the edge is purple, I tried restarting and resetting to factory reset but it hasn't gone away

I also noticed when charging the phone heats up a good amount heats up a good amount, more than my old phone

I'm not sure what's wrong or what I should do?
